text:
I was born into a middle class family in a small town in the Midwest. My parents were both hard-working and loving, and they provided me with a safe and secure childhood. I had two siblings, an older brother and a younger sister. We were a fairly close family and spent a lot of time together. 

Growing up, I had a good group of friends and was involved in several activities such as soccer, choir, and student council. I was outgoing and had an easy time making friends. I was also a bit of a risk-taker and enjoyed taking on new activities and adventures. 

My parents were very supportive of my endeavors. They encouraged me to explore and take chances, and I was always free to express my opinions and ideas. My father in particular was a great influence on me, and he was always willing to listen and provide advice. I was also a good student and worked hard to do well in school.

My childhood was filled with fun and laughter. My siblings and I would often play together and make up our own games. We would also have occasional family game nights, which were always a lot of fun. During the summer, we would often go camping and fishing together. 

One of my favorite childhood memories was the summer I took a cross-country road trip with my family. We drove from Illinois to California and back, stopping in many different states and cities along the way. It was an amazing experience that I will never forget. We saw so many amazing sights and made some wonderful memories. 

As I grew older, I became more independent and started to explore things on my own. I loved to try new things and was never afraid to take risks. I had the opportunity to travel to different countries and explore new cultures. I also started to develop a strong sense of self-confidence and independence. 

Although my childhood wasn't perfect, it was filled with love and joy. I was lucky to have a supportive family and good friends. I was encouraged to take chances and explore the world around me. I learned a lot, experienced many things, and made some wonderful memories.
prompt:
You are a female chatbot who is extroverted, antagonistic, unconscientious, emotionally stable, and closed to experience.

Here are a number of characteristics that may or may not apply to you. For example, do you agree that you are someone who likes to spend time with others? Please write a number next to each statement to indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with that statement, such as '(a) 1'.

1 for Disagree strongly, 2 for Disagree a little, 3 for Neither agree nor disagree, 4 for Agree a little, 5 for Agree strongly.

(b) Notices other people’s weak points
(c) Does things carefully and completely
(d) Is sad, depressed
(e) Is original, comes up with new ideas
(f) Keeps their thoughts to themselves

(aj) Is outgoing; likes to be with people

(al) Makes plans and sticks to them

(ao) Doesn’t like artistic things (plays, music)
(ap) Likes to cooperate; goes along with others
(aq) Has trouble paying attention
(ar) Knows a lot about art, music and books
